pullRequest.title: Make Biomes O' Plenty work
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #98
Requires PatchworkMC/patchwork-patcher#60 (merged)
Partially blocked on PatchworkMC/patchwork-patcher#57

nodes.bodyText: Best practice would be to type this as List, rather than ArrayList, we shouldn't care about the class of the object behind it.
Could this just be implemented as an Accessor?

nodes.bodyText: Can you add a comment on why this is needed?

commit.message: Switch from ArrayList to TrackedList in BiomeManager

Explain confusing line in BiomeManager

Co-authored-by: Glitch <glitchieproductionsofficial@gmail.com>

Add TODO for setDirtAt in MixinAbstractTreeFeature

Co-authored-by: Glitch <glitchieproductionsofficial@gmail.com>
Add comment with Yarn version of Intermediary AW
